column3:
A massive California forest fire has ravaged more than 18,000 acres and threatened about 7,000 homes since Monday. 

The man accused of starting it allegedly texted a volunteer firefighter two weeks ago: "This place is going to burn." https://t.co/tq4qHSN6FS
